headline: Should You Buy the 3 Highest-Paying Dividend Stocks in the S&P 500?
summary: The highest-yielding stocks in the S&P 500 index all require a strong stomach if you are going to buy them.

headline: Assessing Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) After Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: If you are wondering whether Alexandria Real Estate Equities is offering good value right now, it helps to step back and look carefully at what the current share price actually reflects. The stock last closed at US$57.26, after returns of 7.5% over the past week and 21.9% over the past month, although the one year and three year returns sit at 39.1% and 56.8% declines. Recent coverage has focused on how the wider market is reassessing specialized real estate such as life science campuses...

headline: Does Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) Dividend Cut Mark a Turning Point for Its Life Science REIT Model?
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. has cut its dividend by 45%, faces multiple securities class action lawsuits tied to a large impairment at its Long Island City property, and recently elevated John Hart Cole to Co-President & Co-Regional Market Director Seattle. These developments highlight mounting pressure on Alexandria’s life science REIT model, as sector headwinds, balance sheet preservation, and legal scrutiny intersect with leadership changes.
